name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Python Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing scalable systems and high-performing APIs for financial platforms. Proficient in leveraging **Python** (primarily **Django**) and adept in **AWS** cloud services, with practical expertise in **Terraform**, **CDK**, and **CloudFormation**. Skilled in **CI/CD**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**, ensuring efficient deployment and orchestration of backend services. Strong background in both relational and schema-less databases, with knowledge in **Go**, **Node.js**, **GraphQL**, and **gRPC**. Recognized for delivering impactful projects through innovative solutions and automation tools while contributing to top-tier organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
